txt.en: Moorstalker and Mithrin wolves can be found in Ered Mithrin.\n\nYou should defeat wolves.
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Moorstalker, a ravenous wild beast in Ered Mithrin.
You have defeated Moorstalker and assisted the expedition.

The bounty notice is written in a messy scrawl. It reads:

'I heard a howling among the high cliffs, and it echoed from rock to rock until I could no longer remember the silence beforehand! It was not the howl of one wolf, no, it could not be; it seemed to be the howling of every wolf that ever stalked the high crags of the mountains. But one was first. One set them all going, and I named him Moorstalker, larger and more frightening than the others.

'My brethren call me mad, but I know what I heard. I offer a reward for any who can bring down Moorstalker and the others of his pack. Let the Ered Mithrin no longer echo with the sound of their call, and I will know my reward was well-earned!'
